channel.title: +1 Forward - Root the RPG
channel.description:
It's a new episode from Rach as she talks to Brendan Conway about Root the RPG!
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/root
**Timecodes:** 02:17 - Read a Sitch about protagonization in PbtA games 10:53 - Open Your Brain to Root the RPG 29:40 - Act Under Fire with Zola the Fox Ranger
**KS Link:** https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/magpiegames/root-the-tabletop-roleplaying-game
